definition: lacquer with a durable glossy black finish, originally from Japan, to coat with a lacquer, as done in Japan
details:
noun
- lacquer with a durable glossy black finish, originally from Japan
= example: lacquer with a durable glossy black finish, originally from Japan
- any lacquerware decorated and varnished in the Japanese manner with a glossy durable black lacquer
= example: any lacquerware decorated and varnished in the Japanese manner with a glossy durable black lacquer
verb
- to coat with a lacquer, as done in Japan
= example: to coat with a lacquer, as done in Japan
